plugin.name: Aarchaeology
plugin.author: Endymion
plugin.description: This is the original script made by Endymion. I have added 2 simple functions. If you are already using the original you do not need to update unless you are using my Market Search script

plugin.name: AutoPractice
plugin.author: Tallimos
plugin.description: Lets you auto practice certain skills and spells.

plugin.name: Envenomizer 2020
plugin.author: Tallimos
plugin.description: Gives Venomists the ability to automatically envenom any weapons given to them and passes them back via a command

plugin.name: Market Search
plugin.author: Tallimos
plugin.description: This gives the user an easier commands to search the market

plugin.name: Mob Keyword Grabber (Brute Force)
plugin.author: Tallimos
plugin.description: This gives the user an automatic way of find out not so obvious mob keywords

plugin.name: QuitCheck
plugin.author: Tallimos
plugin.description: Gives the user an automatic way to store all keys and nosave items in a designated location before they log off

plugin.name: School of Horror Imm Secret Keywords
plugin.author: Tallimos
plugin.description: Lets you easily search up the secret keywords for the imm mobs in school of horrors.

plugin.name: StatDisrupter
plugin.author: Tallimos
plugin.description: Lets you fine tune your spellup but automatically disrupting and recasting a spell the user wants to try for a better cast

plugin.name: Winds Epic Extras
plugin.author: Tallimos
plugin.description: Gives you all the commands you need for a winds run as well as a nice checklist system similar to the Aarchaeology script
